title: Finish up NodeJS Template
details: To finish NodeJS, make it so that it is getting todos from Mongo

title: API on same port as Angular 2 App
details: Make it so that the api is on the same port as angular's port. (See webpack-dev-proxy to see how)

title: Todo Service
details: Have a Service in Angular 2 talk to API

title: Todo Page Component with Service
details: Create a component page that will talk to the Todo Service

title: Link from Home Page
details: Have a link connecting the Todo list to the Home page
